title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Dashboard
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a real-time health monitoring dashboard so that I can efficiently track my clients' health metrics and receive alerts for any anomalies, allowing me to coordinate care effectively across different locations.

title: Customizable Alert System for Anomalies
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a customizable alert system for health anomalies so that I can receive timely notifications and intervene when necessary to ensure the safety and well-being of my clients.

title: Secure Data Access Control for Caregivers
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want secure access to my clients' health data so that I can monitor their well-being while respecting their privacy preferences.

title: Integrated Communication Tools for Health Updates
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want integrated communication tools within ALFRED to receive real-time health updates and manage care effectively, so that I can ensure the well-being of my clients while coordinating with their families and healthcare professionals.

title: Personalized Care Task Management Interface
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a personalized care task management interface so that I can efficiently track health status, manage care schedules, and communicate with families in real-time without complicated setup.

title: User Consent Management for Data Sharing
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to manage user consent for data sharing easily so that I can access the necessary health data of my clients while respecting their privacy preferences.

title: Simplified Setup Process for Caregiver Access
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want a simplified setup process for accessing the ALFRED system so that I can quickly manage multiple clients without technical difficulties and focus on providing care.

title: Health Data Visualization for Easy Interpretation
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a clear and intuitive health data visualization dashboard so that I can quickly interpret the health metrics of my clients at a glance, enabling me to provide timely and effective care.

title: Medication Management and Reminder System
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want a medication management and reminder system so that I can efficiently track my clients' medications and ensure they take them on time, even when I am managing care across different locations.

title: Training Resources for Caregivers on ALFRED Usage
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want access to training resources for using ALFRED effectively so that I can monitor my clients' health and communicate with their families efficiently.
